I just checked, pretending to be plain downloader. I have seen (and been connected to) three guys with 100%, two Transmissions and BitTorrent 7.1 - but - I cannot establish connection to my own seeding server!
It's not usual PeerBlock or FW, I disabled them both, encryption too and raised number of connections to 64... Nothing...

I don't know what is that, I was seeing that seeding speed from my seeding server is extremely low - dragging around 400 kB/s what is stupid.
It might be that my seeding server IP address is blocked somewhere - by someone, and as usual - flooded by paid shills and byte-thrashers...
But - I cannot do anything about. Sorry.

Therefore - main goal and a proof of established connection to my seeding server is appearance of my BiTTornado with 100%. Each downloader who can connect to me - can achieve light-speed download.
